Diversity stats

?

On this page, diversity related data is displayed (shannon diversity)

Drag to zoom, and double-click to zoom out. Use the field in the bottom-left to set a rolling average.

Genotype diversity is measured from the absence / presence of all genes
Reaction genotype diversity is measured from the absence / presence of reactions
Metabolic type diversity is measured from the metabolic types (consumption and production)
Producer diversity is measured from what molecules can be produced by the cells
Consumer diversity is measured from what molecules can be consumed by the cells
Import genotype diversity is measured from the absence / presence of pumps
Export genotype diversity is measured from the absence / presence of exporting pumps
